specials.name: Musakhan
specials.description: Traditional Palestinian roasted chicken with caramelized onions, sumac, and pine nuts served on fresh taboon bread

specials.name: Maqluba
specials.description: Upside-down layered dish of rice, eggplant, cauliflower, and lamb, garnished with toasted almonds and parsley

specials.name: Kunafa Nabulsiya
specials.description: Traditional Palestinian dessert made with shredded phyllo dough, sweet cheese, and aromatic syrup, topped with pistachios
